entry.title: node-blog-init
entry.content:
目录机构

$ mkdir blog1 && cd blog1
$ mkdir bin && touch ./bin/www.js
$ touch app.js
$ npm init -y

.
├── app.js
├── bin
│   └── www.js
└── package.json

安装依赖

$ npm install cross-env --save-dev
$ npm install nodemon --save-dev

修改package.json

{
  "name": "blog1",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "",
  "main": "bin/www.js",
  "bin": {
    "blog1": "www.js"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1",
    "dev": "cross-env NODE_ENV=dev nodemon ./bin/www.js",
    "prd": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production nodemon ./bin/www.js"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "devDependencies": {
    "cross-env": "^7.0.2",
    "nodemon": "^2.0.4"
  }
}

// app.js

const serverHandle = (req, res) => {
  res.setHeader('Content-Type','application/json')

  const resData = {
    name: 'xiaokang',
    env: process.env.NODE_ENV
  }

  res.end(
    JSON.stringify(resData)
  )
}

module.exports = serverHandle


// www.js

const http = require('http');

const PORT = 8000
const serverHandle = require('../app');

const server = http.createServer(serverHandle)
server.listen(PORT)

entry.title: node-http
entry.content:
const http = require('http');
const querystring = require('querystring');

const server = http.createServer((req, res) => {
  const method = req.method
  const url = req.url
  const path = url.split('?')[0]
  const query = querystring.parse(url.split('?')[1])

  res.setHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json')

  const resData = {
    method,
    url,
    path,
    query,
  }

  if (method === 'GET') {
    res.end(
      JSON.stringify(resData)
    )
  }

  if (method === 'POST') {
    let postData = ''
    req.on('data', (chunk) => {
      postData += chunk.toString()
    })
    req.on('end', () => {
      resData.postData = postData
      res.end(
        JSON.stringify(resData)
      )
    })
  }
})

server.listen(8000)
console.log('OK');

entry.title: swift 的基础知识!
entry.content:
1. from objc to swift

const int count = 10; 
double price = 23.55;

NSString *firstMessage = @"Objc is awesome. ";
NSString *secondMessage = @"What do you think?";
NSString *message = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@%@", firstMessage, secondMessage];

NSLog(@"%@", message);


let count = 10
var price = 23.55

let firstMessage = "Swift is awesome. "
let secondMessage = "What do you think?"
var message = firstMessage + secondMessage

print(message)

2. 常量 和 变量

let constant = 10
var y = 10
var x = y + constant

3. 类型推论

// 按住 option 鍵 + 鼠标点击任一变量 = 得出该变量的类型

let constant:Int = 10
var y:Int = 10
var x:Int = y + constant

4. 字符串 String

var message:String = "Talk is cheap, show me the code"

// 字符串追加
var greeting = "Hello"
var name = "xiaoming"
var message = greeting + name

// 大写和小写转换
message.uppercased()
message.lowercased()

// 字符串的字符个数
message.count

// 类型转换
var totalPrice:Int = 100
var totalPriceMessage = "The price of the book is $" + String(totalPrice)

5.流程控制

var time = 6

if time == 6 {
    print("自己煮早餐")
} else {
    print("到外面买早餐")
}

// 或者

switch time {
case 6:
    print("自己煮早餐")
default:
    print("到外面买早餐")
}


var money = 9999

if money >= 100000 {
    print("出国游")
} else if money >= 10000 && money < 100000 {
    print("国内游")
} else if money >= 1000 && money < 10000 {
    print("省内游")
} else {
    print("市内游")
}

// 或者

switch money {
case 100000...:
    print("出国游")
case 10000...99999:
    print("国内游")
case 1000...9999:
    print("省内游")
default:
    print("市内游")
}

6. 数组 Array

var book1 = "水浒传"
var book2 = "三国演义"
var book3 = "西游记"

var bookArray = [book1, book2, book3]

// 获取第一本书
print(bookArray[0])

// 添加一本书
bookArray.append("红楼梦")

// 一共有多少本书
bookArray.count


// 遍历所有书籍
for index in 0...3{
    print(bookArray[index])
}

for index in 0...bookArray.count-1{
    print(bookArray[index])
}

for book in bookArray {
    print(book)
}

7. 字典 Dictionary

var animalDict = [
    "cat": "🐱",
    "dog": "🐶",
    "pig": "🐷",
    "cow": "🐮"
]

// 这里有出现一个警告⚠️ Expression implicitly coerced from 'String?' to 'Any'
print(animalDict["dog"])

for (key, value) in animalDict {
    print("Title: \(key)")
    print("Emoji: \(value)")
    print("---")
}

8. 可选类型 Optionals

// 声明一个为 nil 的 可选类型 字符串
var hobby: String?

hobby = "running"

// ❌ Value of optional type 'String?' must be unwrapped to a value of type 'String'
// var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby

// 所以取值的时，应该解开可选类型

// 1. 暴力解开，使用感叹号 ！
if hobby != nil {
    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobby!
    print(message)

}

// 2. 可选绑定，就是将一个 有值的可选类型 赋给一个 临时的变量
if let hobbyValue = hobby {
    var message = "Your hobby is " + hobbyValue
    print(message)
}

/*
 总结：
    使用了可选类型，就相当于是快递的“货件打包”
    可选类型产生了保护的作用
    收到快递之后，只有拆开快递，才能取出货件，这就是取值
 */

entry.title: Rails + Nginx in Mac
entry.content:
Step1. Rails 项目准备

$ rails new deploy_demo
$ rails g controller welcome index
$ rails s

$ cd deploy_demo
$ git init
$ git add .
$ git commit -m "Init commit"

Step2. Nginx 安装和启动

# 安装
$ brew install nginx 

# 开启
$ brew services start nginx

# 关闭
$ brew services stop nginx

# 重启
$ brew services restart nginx

Step3. Nginx 配置

$ touch /usr/local/etc/nginx/servers/rails_nginx.conf

upstream app {
    # 改成实际 puma.sock 的文件路径
    server unix://Users/liangyk/rails_project/deploy_demo/tmp/sockets/puma.sock;
}

server {
    listen 1234;
    # 改成实际服务器域名
    server_name localhost;

    # 改成实际 APP 路径
    root /Users/liangyk/rails_project/deploy_demo/public;

    try_files $uri/index.html $uri @app;

    location @app {
        proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
        proxy_set_header Host $http_host;
        proxy_redirect off;
        proxy_pass http://app;
    }

    error_page 500 502 503 504 /500.html;
    keepalive_timeout 10;
}

Step4. Puma 配置

config/puma.rb

# port        ENV.fetch("PORT") { 3000 }
+ bind "unix://tmp/sockets/puma.sock"
+ daemonize true

Step5. 脚本控制

$ touch pumactrl.sh

#!/bin/bash

case "$1" in
    "")
        echo -n "please provide a parameter (start, stop, reload)."
        ;;
    start)
        echo -n "starting db:migrate..."
        bin/rails db:migrate
        echo -n "starting assets:precompile..."
        bin/rails assets:precompile
        echo -n "starting puma..."
        puma -e production
        ;;
    stop)
        echo "stoping puma..."
        kill `cat "tmp/pids/server.pid"`
        ;;
esac

$  bash ./pumactrl.sh start
